descriptionHtml:
This is something I made for no reason at all, I was bored. The textures are not too great because I suck at texturing. And I\'m too lazy to learn hot to get it in-game so it\'s not in .nif format. You\'re free to do whatever the hell you want with this model, I\'m done playing around with it.

Model Informations:

Meshes:

Blender
VikingSword.blend - Blender format - 167 kb

Wavefront
VikingSword.obj - Wavefront format - 16.6 kb
VikingSword.mtl - Material data - 277 bytes

3DS Max
VikingSword.3ds - 3D Studio Max format - 7.34 kb

Mesh info:
167 Vertices
450 Edges
288 Polygons

Textures:
VikingSword.dds DXT1 - 2048x2048 diffuse map - 2731 kb
VikingSword_n.dds DXT3 - 2048x2048 normal/specular map - 5462 kb
VikingSword_s.dds DXT1 - 2048x2048 separate specular map for rendering - 2731 kb

Layout:
VikingSwordUVLayout.png - 2048x2048 UV Layout for texturing - 39.3 kb

Programs used:
Blender 2.49
Photoshop CS3

I hope you like it.
author: Werne
